description: This file defines immutable data models for 'Loyalty' and 'LoyaltyHistoryEntry', including serialization and deserialization methods via JSON.

classes.name: LoyaltyHistoryEntry
classes.description: An immutable class representing an entry in loyalty history with fields for date, change, and reason. Includes methods for JSON serialization.

classes.name: Loyalty
classes.description: An immutable class representing a user's loyalty data, including user ID, points, and a list of loyalty history entries. Includes methods for JSON serialization.

methods.name: LoyaltyHistoryEntry.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a LoyaltyHistoryEntry instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: LoyaltyHistoryEntry.toJson
methods.description: Converts a LoyaltyHistoryEntry instance to a JSON map.

methods.name: Loyalty.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a Loyalty instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: Loyalty.toJson
methods.description: Converts a Loyalty instance to a JSON map.
